title: List of all Android machine learning  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android machine learning  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: onyx
repoList.description: An android library that uses technologies like artificial Intelligence, machine learning, and deep learning to make developers understand the content that they are displaying in their app.

repoList.name: cv4j
repoList.description: The target is to set up a high quality and real-time image process and machine learning library which is implemented in pure java. The framework can run application on java desktop and android platform.

repoList.name: weka-android
repoList.description: WEKA Machine Learning framework as an Android Library

repoList.name: android-aws-architecture-components-dialogflow-chatbot
repoList.description: Android chatbot using: Dialogflow (Api.ai) for machine learning & NLP, AWS DynamoDB NoSQL Database, DynamoDB Object Mapper, AWS Cognito Identity. Android Architecture Components: Room Persistence Library, ViewModel, Live Data. MVVM Architecture Pattern

repoList.name: Android-TensorFlow-Lite-Example
repoList.description: Android TensorFlow Lite Machine Learning Example.This is an example project for integrating TensorFlow Lite into Android application This project include an example for object detection for an image taken from camera using TensorFlow Lite library.

repoList.name: NewsApplicationWithWeka
repoList.description: Android News Application With Weka Machine Learning Library

repoList.name: Android_Machine_Learning_Benchmark
repoList.description: Used Weka library to benchmark Machine learning algorithms (SVM, LR, NBC, KNN) on Android

repoList.name: mlkit
repoList.description: Android Machine Learning Library Powered by Java

repoList.name: weka-android
repoList.description: An android port of machine learning library WEKA

repoList.name: WEKA_3.6.10_WinGoku_Android_Port_
repoList.description: Desktop class machine learning library for Android & Android Wear
